title: 3 and Out - Brady Ballin, Dak's Back, Most Hyped Teams, Must Watch Players, 3 for the $ Week 1 ATS Picks, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Brady Ballin, Dak's Back, Most Hyped Teams, Must Watch Players, 3 for the $ Week 1 ATS Picks, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Bucs handling the Cowboys in the season opener, Brady dominating at 44, and his take on Dak's return from injury. He also examines Aaron Rodgers comments that playing QB in the NFL is easier now than ever, gives his most hyped teams, explains why NIL is making CFB more interesting and reveals which week 1 storylines he'll have his eye on. Then, he runs explains why his 3 for the $ Week 1 NFL Picks by Action Network sharp Stuckey, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag.

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
